meanings.definition: Take in or soak up (liquid or other substances)
meanings.sent1: The sponge easily absorbs water from the sink.
meanings.sent2: The paper towel quickly absorbs the spilled juice.
meanings.sent3: The thirsty plant absorbs the raindrops like a drink.
meanings.sent4: Her mind absorbs knowledge like a sponge soaking up water.
meanings.sent5: The desert sand absorbs the heat of the sun during the day.

meanings.definition: Engross the attention or interest of
meanings.sent1: The captivating story absorbs the children's focus completely.
meanings.sent2: The thrilling movie absorbs the audience in suspense.
meanings.sent3: The mystery novel absorbs the reader until the very end.
meanings.sent4: The intense game absorbs all their energy and concentration.
meanings.sent5: The fascinating documentary absorbs viewers with its intriguing facts.

meanings.definition: Assume or take on (a quality or attribute)
meanings.sent1: She absorbs the characteristics of her favorite superhero.
meanings.sent2: The actor absorbs the role of the villain with ease.
meanings.sent3: The chameleon-like friend absorbs the traits of those around him.
meanings.sent4: The artist absorbs the emotions of the painting into her own heart.
meanings.sent5: The student absorbs the wisdom of the teacher like a sponge.
